title: unable to connect to the server
body:
hello!
i just had a normal game where i got unable to connect to the server please check network.
i pinged lol servers (104.160.142.3) and i got great ping (70) with 0% packet lost.
what can i do to prevent this? restarted client, computer and closed all instances of lol and run the game as administrator

replies.body: You'll want to ping to 31.186.224.42, which is the game server for EUNE.  This will help get us an overview of your routing while reaching the proper destination.  Even with solid ping, though, you can still have local blocks or other issues preventing you from reaching the game server.  It's super important to run through the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot that.  Let me know if you have any questions!
